actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-932.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6942 to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year 1981 for international security and development assistance, the Peace Corps, and refugee assistance, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6942 (international security and development assistance, the Peace Corps, and refugee aid).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6942 to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year 1981 for international security and development assistance, the Peace Corps, and refugee assistance, and for other purposes.
